pageContext.claim: “In fact, I see a lot of the Democrats are all -- almost all of them are breaking and saying, "Look, walls are good. Walls are good." Big difference from what you had two or three weeks ago.”
pageContext.analysis: Some Democrats have suggested that House Speaker Nancy Pelosi put a bill that includes the wall up for a vote, but that's not the same as saying "walls are good" and breaking away from the party's position against the president's border wall.
